Text: Thanks for this PDF Xeno.  This is a great book about Chess Strategy.  Make no mistake this isnt a beginners book.  Its an intermediate book that will help you greatly improve.  Xeno's chess torrents this, Chess Mentor, and Chess Genuis are the best torrents on Chess on the entire internet.  I am eternally greatful by what you have shared with us Xeno.  I have seeded all of them a great deal, and will continue to do so.  Xeno is the MAN!
Thanks for the up ---- way back in 2006!
